page.description: How to create the Vendors set.

section.title: Procedure: Creating the Vendors Set
section.description: Follow these instructions to create a set similar to the Vendors set.

step.description: Display Tables/Sets tab of the Control Panel.
Select "Vendor" in the Select a table list.
Select "Product" in the Child Table list.
Select "Vendor_id" in the Parent key list.
Select "Vendor" in the Child key list.
Accept the default values for the Link Type, Referential integrity, and Include record from Parent table controls.
